encounter.message: Hi! I am Old Man Charlie, what brings you to the crossroads?

I am here for treasure!.message: Then head south, there is a vault of treasure there! Beware, it is protected by guards!

I am here for a gear!.message: Then head west, I hear there is gear somewhere in the woods there. Most treasure is locked up, make sure you have a key!

I am here for a fight!.message: Then head east, there are plenty of fights to be had! Some may even have keys to locked boxes in the west...

I am here for healing!.message: Head north for healing, there river there will give you a chance to rest and heal
